author: Joya Singh
comment: I was having difficulty finding the app on my watch, and I emailed customer service to help me out. They were super responsive and very quick to help me out. He walked me through the troubleshooting and I got the watch face working in no time. It's very customizable and I love it! Exactly what I was looking for
title: Great customer service!

author: David K.
comment: Each iteration of updates is making this watch face worse. So much more bugs now. Watch face doesn't load after watch has restarted/powered back on. Glitches with the colour scheme from time to time and battery life of the watch is now worse than before..
title: Getting worse with each update

author: Andrew Plocica
comment: Won't load the custom preset I had made. So I'm stuck with the basic one.

author: Andrew James
comment: Worked for 24 hours, but now it doesn't count steps.  Annoying.
title: Nice face

author: frederic soete
comment: No way to access settings on ticwatch E...I'm stuck with the basic face. Could you please help me out

author: Orlando G.
comment: The presets aren't applied for some reason. If anyone knows how to get it working please let me know.
title: Great but doesn't change colors

author: Rohit Mital
comment: The watch face doesn't update when changing colors (I created a preset)

author: Kamal Iqwan
comment: cannot setup on moto 360 2nd gen!?

author: James Benson
comment: I don't  see the watch face on watch.

author: jon winston
comment: Not seeing it in my app drawer on the phone. It shows up on the watch but I can't tweak it. :(

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content:
Any update Jon did you see my suggestions from before
___
Hi the app is actually in android wear app click the face then you'll see a gear in the center. That will take you to all the face options let me know if you need other help Jon

author: Krisz G
comment: Loving the ability to customize so many things on the face. However some options do not work yet or they don't work as they should. Can't change the color of the widget text. It just uses the color of the digital clock on top. Also tapping on the icon to change the color is not very responsive. Takes a few tries. Tapping on the watch face changes the color theme which can be annoying. I accidentally change it several times a day when I tap on the screen to wake my watch.

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: Hi Krisz I please update you'll now have the availability to change the widget text icon color and turn off tap to change color. You also be able to add presets and alternate ambient modes.

title: Good but still needs work

author: Josh L
comment: The new update made the face better than ever. I truly think it's awesome and has all the customization extras needed.  Just a thought for the future though. It would be cool if you could add a turn on animation like Mango Watch Face. I look forward to future updates.

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content:
Glad you like the updates Josh. I'll think about it the animations it'll take a hit on battery life
_____

Hi Josh the new update lets you get rid of the extras :) Please let me know your feedback on the update.

title: Awesome

author: tristan teav
comment: Would rate higher there was an option for ambient mode that would make the original watch face dimmer instead of just the black and white version offered.

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: If you updated you'll see what your requesting is now a feature with color ambient mode options

title: Needs more options for ambient mode

author: Tony
comment: Would love to see full ambient mode added, also can't change text color of widgets, the grey it's hard to see with a dark background

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: You asked for it and now you have it. Color ambient mode now available with custom presets. Please update and if you like update your review :)

title: Almost prefect

author: Jesse Farebrother
comment: On stock Android 6.0 the app crashes while trying to change the settings for the watch face. Would love to try it out !
title: Crashes when changing settings on M

author: Bill Toto
comment: I cannot get this to show up as a face in wear. Using nexus 6p and moto 360. The Stealth 360 from developer works great. Will change review if it ever shows up.
title: Will review better if I can get it to work

author: John Carden
comment: Can't find a way to make the microphone icon not be there. I can say OK Google if I want voice commands
title: Awesome face

author: Andrei Arcan
comment: Hi, please make an option to disable both of the calendar and weather, in the screenshots they NOT EXIST!!! if you make an option in menu to disable weather and calendar icons and ok google microphone i will rate this 5 stars! Thank you, Andrei

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content:
I held up ny end now your turn Andrei 😀
Andrei please update your wish has come true. turn off what you don't want. but you have to update. thanks

title: Please make update to get rid of the extra features

author: Scott Tobkes
comment: Clean design for my Moto 360. This will be my everyday go to watch face. Plenty of options.
title: Great Developer Support

author: Abdullah Asif
comment: One of my favourites, very clean design and decent customisation options. Highly improved since 3.7 update.
title: Much better now!

author: Tommy
comment: Why does it need to continue running in the background when I'm not using it?

author: Jernej Virag
comment: Didn't show up on Moto 360 2015.
title: Can't use it

author: Zhenyun Qian
comment: Thanks

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: Crashing fixed uploading now please let me know if you get another crash.

author: Duhamel Rosado
comment: I was customizing the watchface and all of a sudden it crashed. Now keeps crashing even after reinstalling! Other than that huge issue I really loved the new features. Please fix it! This is my daily driver!
title: Crashing Eternally on G Watch R

author: Dennis Wright
comment: Unfortunately I changed a load of options via the Android Wear app at the same time. Can't say which one triggered the crashing. But right now there is no way back.  Shame because I really like the watchface.  You get 5 stars for the app - taking a reasonably quick fix on trust.

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: Crashing fixed uploading now please let me know if you get another crash.

title: Same problem as Duhamel Rosado

author: Evin Chan
comment: Hi, this watchface is really great, but recently I started changing the settings on my android wear and boom it crashed and now I can't use this watchface. Please fix it thanks.
title: Keeps crashing

author: Daniel Davila
comment: Couldn't be better! :D
title: Awesome!

author: Gary Parizek
comment: Even better than before has whether to great
title: Now has date

author: Nicklaus Tanaka
comment: This is my favorite watch face to date! It was the first one I bought and the one I keep coming back to. And when I had a problem (not with this watch face but with Android Wear) I received a response within a few minutes by a human being who cared and offered me actual solutions. This is a great dev and a great watch face! Makes me want to buy more of their faces to support and because they're the best looking in the whole play store!
title: Customer service! Oh and a great watch face!

author: Troy Snell
comment: Was expecting much more. Some settings would be nice. Square version seems thrown together. Google search icon has got to go. Replace the icon with something more useful...
title: Uhm..

author: Yusuf Islam
comment: This looks great but the only thing I am slightly annoyed by is the Google mic icon. Hoping this gets an option to be removed
title: Dark and Red = Slick!

author: Adam Saunders
comment: Really simple, easy and quick to read and that glow around the edge sets the watch face back in such a way that makes it look very real. Great job!
title: My favorite watch face by far!

author: Aaron Bernas
comment: The black background is not solid. There is an island of darker black in the middle. Annoying on my LG G Watch. Please fix
title: Problem

author: Kenneth Jerney
comment: My current watch face. Only issue is the second hand lags showing up.

author: Nitun Das
comment: Feeling bad for u guys
title: Graphic is not good in lg g watch

author: Marcus Woodbridge
comment: Nice on LG watch R but would love some colour choice other than red...
title: Please add colour options

author: JL Rodriguez
comment: The graphics on this watch face are very sharp and crisp.
title: Great Watch Face

author: Shubham Khichi
comment: Please add color options to give it more premium look
title: Add color options

author: Waymon Mattison Jr
comment: Simple and elegant. One of my goto faces
title: Favorite face

author: Jonathan M
comment: Looks awes(ome)
